title: Winning friends by training workers is China’s new gambit
description: Vocational workshops sponsored by China are emblematic of President Xi Jinping’s efforts to extend his country’s soft power alongside its economic might.

title: U.S. destroys the last of its chemical weapons stockpile
description: The United States has completed a decades-long operation to rid its stockpiles of chemical weapons, the Pentagon affirmed Monday.

title: Heavy rains bash India, causing flooding, landslides, and killing 22
description: The floods in North India were caused by intense rains that also led to landslides, especially in the heavy-hit Himachal Pradesh region.

title: Erdogan links Turkey’s European Union bid to Sweden’s NATO hopes
description: It was unclear whether the Turkish leader planned to act as a spoiler at the NATO summit on Monday, or was instead trying to wring concessions from Western allies.

title: In photos, videos: Heavy rains trigger deadly flooding, landslides in Japan
description: At least three people were killed as a result of the rain, which has been heaviest in Fukuoka, Saga and Oita prefectures in southwestern Japan.

title: After Yellen visit, China speaks of ‘rainbows’ but prepares for trade battle
description: While Treasury Secretary Janet L. Yellen's visit was praised, Beijing is deeply irked by U.S. "de-risking" policies and is readying countermeasures.

title: Putin met with Wagner leader Prigozhin after failed mutiny, Kremlin says
description: In the June 29 meeting, which lasted about three hours, Putin “gave his assessment” of the private military company’s fighting record in Ukraine and offered them options for employment, the Kremlin spokesman said.

title: Biden visits U.K. ahead of NATO summit amid alliance divisions
description: The United States and the United Kingdom, largely aligned on global issues are also working through some of the differences in their approaches to Kyiv

title: Ukraine live briefing: Biden in Britain to meet king, prime minister before NATO summit
description: Biden is scheduled to meet with King Charles III and Prime Minister Rishi Sunak ahead of a gathering of NATO leaders in Lithuania and a stop in Finland.

title: Six killed, including three children, in Chinese kindergarten stabbing
description: Violent crime is relatively rare in China, but there have been a number of knife attacks at schools in recent years, leading to heightened security.

title: A fateful summit 15 years ago hangs over the NATO meeting in Vilnius
description: Those in favor of fast-tracking Ukraine’s NATO accession argue that the lesson of 2008 was that the West can no longer be afraid of “poking the bear,” as Vladimir Putin’s aggression unfurled in the absence of a NATO membership process for Georgia and Ukraine.
